idea-plugin.name: better-mybatis-generator
idea-plugin.description:
function：use in idea database tool，right click table(one or more) to generate mybatis files (include:dao、example、domain、xml)

step1: connect database in idea.
step2：select one or more tables,right click and select "mybatis generate" to open generatoe main UI.
step3：check configuration,click ok
step4：provide account and password for the first time.
step4：generate work finish,check files and it can be use.

setting: "Tools -> MyBatis Log Plugin" set custom default configuration，If not, use the program default configuration.

more tutorial please visit here
